items.name: Gamma Ray
items.long_description: An average yet versatile gun, for a low cost.

items.name: Gauss Cannon
items.long_description: The spread on these guns makes it easier to be effective at a longer range.

items.name: Disruptor
items.long_description: This gun's bullets are charged at a higher level and do more damage per hit.

items.name: Shredder
items.long_description: Shredder can generate a lot of fire in a little time, but is generally more costly.

items.name: Phaser
items.long_description: Phasers focus on raw effectiveness. It is only limited by its narrow and fragile bullet stream.

items.name: Plasma Beam
items.long_description: The Plasma Beam can do a fair amount of damage while also creating bouncing and spread bullets. It is valuable in any scenario.

items.name: Arcfire Array
items.long_description: Its damage is high but has a low rate of fire. Good for keeping range from enemies.

items.name: Neutron Gun
items.long_description: Basic, high energy bounce.

items.name: Mass Driver
items.long_description: The Mass Driver generates very many bullets at once, flooding corridors.

items.name: GigajouleRailgun
items.long_description: Level 4 bullets.

events.message: This gun will appear to shoot L3 bullets, but will affect enemies as L4.

items.name: Dual Laser
items.long_description: This prototype weapon has varying single- and multi-fire properties.

items.name: Harpy Missile
items.long_description: Harpy Missiles will explode as long as they are in proximity of a target.

items.name: Impact Bomb
items.long_description: Basic, efficient bomb.

items.name: String of Pearls
items.long_description: Quickly deploys mines.

items.name: HE Missile
items.long_description: HE Missiles have a greater impact with twice the splash damage of a regular bomb.

items.name: Falcon Missile
items.long_description: Falcon Missiles generate several shrapnel on impact.

items.name: Space Mines
items.long_description: Space Mines can cover a great area with large proximity mines.

items.name: Photon Bolt
items.long_description: This bomb deals some of the highest levels of splash damage available.

items.name: Cluster Bomb
items.long_description: With high splash and shrapnel damage, this bomb can be quite intimidating. Although, its reload time and energy costs are high.

items.name: Cyclone
items.long_description: The Cyclone system fires three missiles at once to deal a huge burst of damage.

items.name: Phoenix Missile
items.long_description: Phoenix Missiles are great at flooding areas with tons of shrapnel.

items.name: TacNuke
items.long_description: TacNukes can make a huge impact, but take a while to reload.

items.name: Reaper
items.long_description: The Reaper is designed to create a lot of damage for very little energy. However, its reload time is very high.

items.name: Ion Drive
items.long_description: Ion Drives do not try to excel in any particular area. Instead, they offer decent stats in all areas with no drawbacks.

items.name: IceFire
items.long_description: IceFire can offer very high sublight speeds, but is not so effective at braking.

items.name: Retro Rockets
items.long_description: Retro Rockets top off on speed rather quickly, but can always change course immediately.

items.name: Carnot Engine
items.long_description: Sacrifices afterburners for stronger normal engines.

items.name: Nuclear Booster
items.long_description: The Nuclear Booster allows heavy ships to gain speed much more quickly.

items.name: H2 RamScoop
items.long_description: Redirects some engine power into recharge.

items.name: Reflection Drive
items.long_description: Redirects some engine power into energy.

items.name: Semiwarp Burners
items.long_description: Semiwarp Burners create powerful afterburning capabilities.

items.name: Omega Drive
items.long_description: Powerful in all areas.

items.name: Sleipnir Drive
items.long_description: Replaces a ship's drive by larger, more powerful engines that are hardly affected by heavy loads.

items.name: Asgard Engine
items.long_description: Capable of very high speeds when afterburning, or high thrust when using normal engines.

items.name: Fusion Reactor
items.long_description: Fusion Reactor offers a fair balance of energy and recharge, and other features.

items.name: ESPER System
items.long_description: Emphasizes maximum energy while lacking recharge.

items.name: Compression Core
items.long_description: Emphasizes high recharge while lacking energy.

items.name: Quantum Reactor
items.long_description: Similar to Fusion Reactor, but more powerful at the cost of some mobility.

items.name: Resonance Sphere
items.long_description: High maximum energy, slows your ship down.

items.name: Tokamak
items.long_description: High maximum recharge, slows your ship down.

items.name: ZPM
items.long_description: Rare reactor core, providing massive energy.

items.name: Mezon Capacitor
items.long_description: Provides some of the highest recharge levels available.

items.name: Ampere Imploder
items.long_description: Evens out energy and recharge at a high level.

items.name: Aux. Alternator
items.long_description: Instead of providing much energy and recharge, the Auxiliary Alternator cuts down on weapon and device costs.

items.name: Ablative Armor
items.long_description: Offers a ten percent reduction from all types of damage.

items.name: Metaphasic Armor
items.long_description: Reduces incoming damage from all bullets by about twenty percent.

items.name: Shock Matrix
items.long_description: Reduces bomb damage by about twenty percent.

items.name: Wave Disperser
items.long_description: Wave Dispersers make your ship more resilient against splash damage and shrapnel.

items.name: Radiating Coils
items.long_description: Cuts the damage of shrapnel and bursts dramatically.

items.name: Faraday Shield
items.long_description: The Faraday Shield was designed to make ships more resilient against EMP and High-energy weapons.

items.name: Weapons Scanner
items.long_description: Helps you to detect the trajectory of missiles or mines from a long range.

items.name: LR Sensors
items.long_description: Greatly enhances the distance your radar reaches.

items.name: Tachyon Sensor
items.long_description: Effectively reveals stealthed and cloaked ships.

items.name: Power Strip
items.long_description: A cheap boost to ship energy levels.

items.name: Maneuvering Fins
items.long_description: Lets your ship make more effective maneuvers.

items.name: Prismatic Core
items.long_description: Reduces the delay of guns and bombs.

items.name: Stealth Shaper
items.long_description: Gives you stealth capabilities to avoid detection on enemy radars.

items.name: Cloak Shaper
items.long_description: Ships without special sensors will not be able to see you.

items.name: Maxwell Infusers
items.long_description: Reduces the energy cost of afterburners and increases their output.

items.name: System Optimizer
items.long_description: Offers small upgrades in a variety of areas for overall optimization.

items.name: Sensor Disruptor
items.long_description: Sensor Disruptors grant free antiwarp, hides your energy, and provides other bonuses.

items.name: Manifold Core
items.long_description: Affects several ship systems that most items cannot.

items.name: Evasion Mount
items.long_description: Evasion Mount provides several rockets and a repel. Great for entering or exiting combat.

items.name: Decoy System
items.long_description: Use decoys and portals to manipulate enemies.

items.name: Turret Mount
items.long_description: Allows up to two ships to stay on your ship, acting as turrets.

items.name: Close Combat
items.long_description: Great for close-quarters fights.

items.name: Siege Pack
items.long_description: Provides a Thor's Hammer, a high-explosive bomb that travels through walls, and a burst.

items.name: Wall Mount
items.long_description: Requires the purchase of individual bricks. Check the consumables category.

items.name: Field Generator
items.long_description: Requires individual field ammo. Check the consumables category.

items.name: Combo Mount
items.long_description: One of every item except for brick.

items.name: Point Defense
items.long_description: Point Defense is an automated protection system armed with high energy weapons.

events.message: You can temporarily detach the turret with the attach key.

items.name: ID Drive
items.long_description: Use ?id <sector> to move from one sector to another.

events.message: Use ?id <1-8 or C> to engage the ID Drives.
ID Drive activated!

items.name: Evoker
items.long_description: Summons small- and medium-sized ships.

events.message: Use /?summon to summon teammates.

items.name: Summoner
items.long_description: PM a teammate with ?summon to attach them to you.  Type ?antisummon to block being summoned.

events.message: Use /?summon to summon teammates.

items.name: Sensor Pod
items.long_description: Converts an Equipment slot into a Sensor slot.

items.name: Equipment Pod
items.long_description: Converts a Mount slot into an Equipment slot.

items.name: Mount Pod
items.long_description: Converts an Equipment slot into a Mount slot.

items.name: Extra FTL
items.long_description: The moment you've been waiting for... Dual-FTL Lancaster.

items.name: Parasite
items.long_description: The Parasite will restrict your ship greatly, but it's rumored to produce something...

events.message: The Parasite has been applied.
The Parasite continues to sap your ship...
The Parasite has lost its appetite! It left behind a Shell.

items.name: Nanomite Swarm
items.long_description: A huge number of destructive, self-replicating nanoscale robots.

events.message: The Nanomite swarm slowly covers your ship...
The swarm grows as it absorbs ship debris...
The destruction of your ship weakens the swarm...
The Nanomite swarm has fully evolved into the Molecular Cover!

items.name: Baryon Injector
items.long_description: Ludicrous speed.

items.name: Temporal Core
items.long_description: Unsurpassed reactor.

items.name: Adamantine Shell
items.long_description: Legendary armor.

items.name: Supercomputer
items.long_description: Using Dual-Quad-Quad Core processing, the Supercomputer is able to provide many sensors and disruptors at once.

items.name: Dilithium Matrix
items.long_description: The Dilithium Matrix allows ships to travel at faster-than-light speeds in any direction. See ?man blink for directions.

items.name: Energy Infusion
items.long_description: Use the brick to get a full recharge immediately. 3 uses.

events.message: Energy Infusion will work three times.
Energy Infusion has run out of uses!

items.name: Thorstorm
items.long_description: Stores Thor's Hammers for periodic use or a major siege

events.message: You have fifteen bricks at your disposal!
Fortress Bricks lost!
Fortress Bricks lost!

items.name: Revival Module
items.short_description: Revives your ship immediately upon death
items.long_description: Occasionally revives your ship immediately upon death; does not work while carrying flags

items.name: RM-Booster
items.short_description: Improves the output of the Revival Module
items.long_description: Improves the output of the Revival Module, increasing its activation frequency

events.message: Opalus Relay lost!

items.name: Shell
items.long_description: Once a Parasite has grown tired of a particular host ship, it leaves behind this valuable Shell.

items.name: Molecular Cover
items.long_description: A passive Nanomite Swarm that absorbs the energy of incoming weapons to maintain itself.

items.name: Cobalt Warhead Mk. 2
items.long_description: The bomb detonates at the site of death

events.message: Cobalt Warhead activated!

items.name: Ball and Chain
items.long_description: Bonus item for PRO players.

items.name: Salvo
items.long_description: Fast firing but inefficient.

items.name: Power Limiter
items.long_description: Limits a reactor's output to prevent overloading

items.name: Chaos Field
items.long_description: Creates a field which will shove enemies inside of it and generally disrupt their perception of reality. Requires a Field Generator.

items.name: Flash Drive
items.long_description: The Flash Drive allows a ship to change velocity very effectively.

items.name: Shrap Booster
items.long_description: Increases effectiveness of shrapnel.

items.name: Warp Disruptor
items.long_description: Gives you antiwarp capabilities to prevent enemies from warping away.

items.name: Sharppinger
items.long_description: Ancient classic.

items.name: Naquadah Gen.
items.long_description: Balanced but unstable reactor; very weak in bases.

items.name: Shrap Multiplier
items.long_description: Increases shrapnel count.

items.name: Glow Cover
items.long_description: Draws energy from reactors to provide enhanced protection.

items.name: Solid Neutronium
items.long_description: Heavy but very effective armor.

items.name: Positron Gun
items.long_description: Delivers efficient high damage bounce bullets.

items.name: Proton Beam
items.long_description: Powerful high efficiency.

items.name: Pea Shooter
items.long_description: Rapid bounce bullet spam.

items.name: Beam Array
items.long_description: Floods an area for guaranteed and weak, but sustained, damage. Weak to EMPs.

items.name: Evasion Shaper
items.long_description: Offers both stealth & cloak in the same item, but increases the drain cost for both and reduces reactor recharge power.

items.name: Oracle System
items.long_description: The Oracle System provides free x-radar, improves sensors, and provides other bonuses.

items.name: Inertial Damper
items.long_description: Inertial Dampers use active sensors to fine-tune flight stability.

items.name: Burst
items.long_description: Shoots powerful bullets in all directions

items.name: Repel
items.long_description: Creates a forcefield, temporarily pushing enemies away

items.name: Brick
items.long_description: Creates walls for enemy ships

items.name: Decoy
items.long_description: Creates a decoy to throw off enemies

items.name: Portal
items.long_description: Creates a temporary, one-time use, warp point.

items.name: Rocket
items.long_description: Rapidly thrusts your ship forward

items.name: Thor's Hammer
items.long_description: A powerful, incorporeal bomb with a proximity trigger. Travels through walls.

items.name: Repel Capacitor
items.long_description: Allows repels to be gathered and stored for rapid release

items.name: Burst Capacitor
items.long_description: Allows bursts to be gathered and stored for rapid release

items.name: Energy Scanner
items.long_description: Reveals the energy levels of all enemy ships

items.name: Diamond Pod
items.long_description: Sacrifices EXP gains for additional HSD

items.name: Training Pod
items.long_description: Restricts movement and HSD rewards to provide additional EXP

items.name: Reward Restrictor
items.long_description: Reduces rewards

items.name: Jump Beacon
items.long_description: Allows for summoning of other lancs.  Beacon lancs cannot be summoned by other Beacon lancs.  Beacon lancs also cannot "vanilla" attach to ANY lanc.

items.name: Infiltrator
items.long_description: Allows sharks to attach to more ships.

items.name: Turret Platform
items.long_description: Allows up to four ships to turret.

items.name: Decoy Capacitor
items.long_description: Allows decoys to be gathered and stored for rapid release

items.name: Overthruster
items.long_description: Allows for rapid turns and maneuvers.
